data.text: @alia_dalwai Dear Ma'am, please know from Mumbai to Dubai, you may carry 30kg as check-in baggage and 8kg as hand baggage. In order to do that passenger can carry 1 check-in bag of 30kg or 2 check-in bags weighing not more than 30kg. 1/2

data.text:
#FlyAI: Fly direct from Mumbai to San Francisco, thrice a week, starting 15th December 2022, with round-trip fares from ₹1,02,837/-
First. Fastest. Non-stop.

Explore our website to book now: https://t.co/lbOfQegVIp

#MumbaiToSanFrancisco
#NonStopFlights #NonStopExperiences https://t.co/gSSviMvOIz
